tweet.text: Forty years ago today the U.S. Senate ratified the #PanamaCanal Treaty! Check out this letter from President Carter to General Torrijos of #Panama celebrating the event https://t.co/wPuFxkz7Sf #FRUS #Twitterstorians #OTD
